caption: Relating to the Texas Sovereignty Act.
authors: Bell, Cecil, Spiller, Gerdes, Leo Wilson, Metcalf
summary: Unable to determine specific impacts to Chinese immigrants or others as this document is only a fiscal note stating there are no significant financial implications to state or local government from implementing HB796 (Texas Sovereignty Act).
translation: 无法确定对中国移民或其他人的具体影响，因为这份文件只是一份财政说明，仅表明实施HB796（德克萨斯主权法案）对州政府和地方政府没有重大财政影响。
committees:
1. House Committee on State Affairs
2. House Committee on Appropriations
3. House Committee on Ways and Means
category: Irrelevant - This is only a fiscal note, not the actual bill text needed to determine impacts on immigrants or specific nations
